KtFX Kotlin for JavaFX

About Artifacts

About

Kotlin extensions for JavaFX app development and more

Based on

JavaFX bundled in Oracle JDK 8.

Built with

Written 99.9% in Kotlin and Gradle scripts.

Available on

All artifacts are available on JCenter

Artifacts

KtFX Commons

Full of extensions for JavaFX, packaged accordingly. The main goal of core library is not to add any new feature to the existing JavaFX APIs. Below are preview of some of the packages.

Javadoc

KtFX Layouts

Generate JavaFX layouts and controls with Kotlin DSL, no FXML required.

Check it out

KtFX Listeners

Trade common JavaFX listener with Kotlin DSL. Currently includes string converters and table cells.

Javadoc

KtFX Coroutines

Based on the experimental kotlinx.coroutines library, it allows invoking JavaFX EventHandler the coroutine way.

Check it out

KtFX Styles

When writing inline styles, longer strings tend to be hard to read and more likely to cause error. Replace it with type-safe style builders.

Javadoc
